current.description: Phase 14: OpenTelemetry Integration, Real-time Analytics & POS Demo Enhancements
features: OpenTelemetry instrumentation for complete distributed tracing
POS Demo backend OpenTelemetry integration with OTLP exporter
Real-time Analytics Dashboard with live metrics monitoring
Real-time button added to header and sidebar navigation
Live error rate and throughput charts with real-time updates
Latency trend visualization (P50 and P99 metrics)
Active alerts display with severity-based filtering
System health status indicator with uptime tracking
Auto-refresh capability with pause/resume controls
Window selection for different time periods (1min, 5min, 1hour)
Fixed start-stack.sh vite configuration path issue
Fixed POS demo frontend missing configuration files (vite.config.ts, tsconfig)
Fixed Vite cache optimization for chart.js and react-chartjs-2
Improved dashboard API error boundary error display
Resolved port conflicts between multiple services (5173, 5174, 5175, 3000, 3001)
Enhanced service startup sequencing in start-stack.sh
Clean Vite dependency cache mechanism
Comprehensive version 0.9.5 documentation with detailed change tracking

developmentMilestones.description: Initial project structure, AI/ML foundation, and basic authentication system established
File upload system, analysis reports, dashboard, and database features implemented
Analysis History, All Errors page, AI Analysis page, and Reports system completed
Advanced AI suggestions, ML training workflows, and complete AI analysis system
Enhanced folder structure, advanced login systems, and comprehensive UI improvements
Windows deployment, Docker containerization, and production infrastructure setup
Complete restructure to production-ready monorepo with 675+ comprehensive test suite
100% test pass rate achieved with Firebase authentication and 2FA security integration
Searchable UI components and Git-based comprehensive version tracking system

changes: ✨ Implemented Real-time Analytics Dashboard with live metrics monitoring
🔍 Added OpenTelemetry instrumentation to POS Demo backend
��️ Fixed Vite configuration for frontend and POS demo services
📊 Resolved chart.js dependency optimization and import issues
⚙️ Fixed service startup sequencing in start-stack.sh
🎯 Added Real-time button to header and sidebar navigation
🔄 Implemented auto-refresh with pause/resume controls
❤️ Added system health status monitoring dashboard
📈 Created comprehensive performance metrics display
🔧 Fixed port conflict resolution in stack initialization
Fixed All Errors page to show system-wide data from all users instead of user-specific data
Fixed Reports page to aggregate data from all users for comprehensive analytics
Fixed Files API to return system-wide files instead of user-specific files
Dashboard summary cards (Total Files, Total Errors, Critical Issues, Resolution Rate) now display system-wide/global data
Error Trends and Severity Distribution charts on the dashboard now use system-wide data sources for accurate global analytics
AI Analysis page now shows global AI/ML statistics and consolidated error data (no longer limited to the logged-in user)
Enhanced card loading animations with proper spacing and visual separation
Implemented system-wide error types, stores, and kiosk filtering across all pages
Improved multi-select dropdown functionality for better user experience
Enhanced filter layouts and responsive design across error management pages
Fixed Select All functionality in multi-select dropdowns
Optimized error type and severity filtering performance
Converted reports endpoint from user-specific to system-wide data aggregation
Enhanced loading animations with proper spacing in stats cards and reports
Implemented trends calculations using system-wide data sources
Fixed reports showing same data for different date ranges
Implemented searchable store and kiosk dropdowns with real-time filtering
Created comprehensive Git-based versioning system with external JSON data
Enhanced upload page UX with reusable SearchableSelect component
Added complete development timeline based on 12 distinct implementation phases
Documented all major development milestones from July 12 - Oct 22, 2025
Fixed all test cases - 100% pass rate achieved across 675+ tests
Resolved Firebase token authentication issues with proper API integration
Stabilized CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions branch protection
Added admin settings with 2FA security implementation
Complete monorepo restructure with 140+ files reorganized
Implemented comprehensive testing framework with 675+ test cases
Added GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline with branch protection
Established professional production-ready folder structure
Implemented Windows server deployment scripts and automation
Added Docker containerization and orchestration setup
Created database schema with Drizzle ORM implementation
Established core API structure and backend services
Resolved CI failures with database auto-creation
Fixed ESLint configuration issues
Updated TypeScript compilation workflow

v0.9.4.title: Comprehensive Bug Fixes & System-Wide Data Architecture

changes.description: Fixed All Errors page to show system-wide data from all users instead of user-specific data

Fixed Files API to return system-wide files instead of user-specific files

bugfixes: Resolved reports showing identical data across different date ranges

Dashboard cards incorrectly scoped to user fixed (now global)
Error Trends & Severity Distribution charts fixed to use global data
AI Analysis statistics and consolidated views fixed to be global
Corrected API endpoints to use getAllErrors() instead of getErrorsByUser()
Fixed card loading animations sticking to title text
Resolved version display issues in footer modal popup
performance: Improved system-wide data aggregation performance
Enhanced loading state management across all components

v0.9.5.title: OpenTelemetry Integration & Real-time Analytics Dashboard
v0.9.5.description: Major release introducing distributed tracing via OpenTelemetry, a comprehensive real-time analytics dashboard with live metrics, and resolution of critical frontend configuration issues.

changes.description: Real-time Analytics Dashboard - Live error rate, throughput, and latency visualization with 5-second auto-refresh
OpenTelemetry Instrumentation - Complete distributed tracing for POS Demo backend with OTLP exporter
Real-time Navigation - Added Real-time button to header and sidebar for easy access
System Health Monitoring - Health status indicator with uptime tracking and resource metrics
Active Alerts Management - Severity-based alert filtering and real-time display
Fixed Vite configuration path issue causing 404 errors in frontend
Resolved missing configuration files in POS demo frontend (index.html, vite.config.ts, tsconfig)
Fixed Vite optimizeDeps configuration to properly pre-bundle chart.js and react-chartjs-2
Resolved port allocation conflicts in start-stack.sh startup script
Fixed 504 Outdated Optimize Dep errors in browser console
Improved dependency optimization for large monorepo projects
Better error state handling in dashboard with improved error boundaries
Enhanced service startup sequencing for more reliable initialization

performance: Real-time metrics visualization with 5-second auto-refresh
Metrics aggregation latency: < 500ms
Alert evaluation time: < 1 second
Chart rendering time: < 200ms
